comments.creator: MatsPalmgren_bugz@use.startmail.com
comments.text:
STEPS TO REPRODUCE
1. GECKO_VERIFY_REFLOW_FLAGS="verify,all"  firefox ...

ACTUAL RESULTS
###!!! ASSERTION: We have a presshell already!: '!mPresShell', file content/base/src/nsDocument.cpp, line 3174
###!!! ASSERTION: You can't dereference a NULL nsCOMPtr with operator->().: 'mRawPtr != 0', file ../../dist/include/nsCOMPtr.h, line 819

crash stack:

nsStyleSet::EnableQuirkStyleSheet
PresShell::Init
nsDocument::doCreateShell
PresShell::VerifyIncrementalReflow
PresShell::DoVerifyReflow
PresShell::ProcessReflowCommands
PresShell::FlushPendingNotifications
PresShell::DidDoReflow
...
comments.author: MatsPalmgren_bugz@use.startmail.com
